name: Vidya Sagar
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub page.
Hello! I'm Vidya Sagar and this is my tiny space of the internet. I'm a graduate student currently based out of Binghamton, New York. I love Java and Python - yes, the real ones too. ;)

Here's a small tip on how to create a new repository using Git:

```
Clone an existing repository
$ git clone ssh://user@domain.tld/repo.git
Clone an existing repository and all its sub-modules recursively
$ git clone --recursive ssh://user@domain.tld/repo.git
Create a new local repository
$ git init

```


### My Experience
Possesses experience in all phases of software development life cycle from design, analysis to development and testing. Worked extensively in the projects pertaining to data privacy involving technologies such as Java, Java Script, Ext JS, AJAX, JSP, Servlet, SQL, SOAP and REST.


### References
Firstly, I thank Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) who founded GitHub. Especially, thanks to 'Bala Gangadhar' (@Balagangadhar) for introducing GitHub to me. Cheers! :)


### Contact
Check out my LinkedIn profile at https://in.linkedin.com/in/vidyasagarvalluri or contact me at vidyasagar.039@gmail.com and I'll get back to you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
